text: Neelakurukkan is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Shaji Kailas, starring Ashokan and Baiju in the lead roles. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/gallery_neelakurukkan-.htm ==Cast== *Ashokan as Binoy *Baiju as Sudheer *Mahesh as Rajeev *Ganesh Kumar as Nazar *Saikumar as Lalu *Soumya as Anitha Samuel /Rejani *Suchithra Murali as Meera *Maniyanpilla Raju as Fa. Illikkoodan *Bheeman Raghu as Abukka *Philomina as Kunjanamma *Risabava as Sunny Samuel *Shivaji as Khader *Mala Aravindan as principal *Subair as police commissioner *Kuthiravattam Pappu as chakkochen *Thrissur Elsy as wife of house owner *Kalabhavan Rahman *K.P.A.C. Sunny *Prathapachandran as father of lalu ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Neelakurukkan
